spec.name: Custom voice commands API
spec.description:
This API is written in Node TypeScript using the Express framework to create a restful API
It facilitates custom voice commands to execute the corresponding configured API endpoint created by this API's admins

Source Code: Go To Github
This project was part of a school assignment where we could build any API we wanted to with the only rule being that the API must use and process an already existing public API and store data in a Mongo Database
This API uses the Microsoft Speech API to translate speech to text
